WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 05 APR
   BY M/V SW DIAMOND TOWING TWO 225 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-00.21S 043-08.83W, 25-14.48S 042-41.26W,
   25-05.04S 042-11.65W, 25-22.86S 042-43.32W,
   25-09.61S 043-10.13W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 06 APR 22.
